attributes.title: THESE TERMS & CONDITIONS ARE WACK
attributes.review:
To enter the rewards program to earn stuff - which is literally all this app has to offer besides a feed of events or other BS that can be found on an social media platform, and asking for money - you have to enter a binding contract to participate in all trumps events and campaign for him?! That sounds like some entitled snowflake commie BS and that’s not patriotic at all. I came here to meet fellow patriots to crush the liberal devils infiltrated our sweet motherland and forcing abortions on our children and teaching satanic hymns over vegan school lunches and teaching them the correct yet very hurtful history of our beloved confederate heroes and brainwashing them into questioning our government and not encouraging our sons to enlist and risk their lives for oil in foreign countries AND THATS WHAT MAKES AMERICA GREAT. IF I CANT MEET FELLOW GUN TOTING WAR LOVING PROTESTANT CHRISTIANS WHO LOVE JESUS AND HATE OBAMA THEN WHAT IS THIS AOO GOOD FOR? No I will NOT make a binding contract through an app to pledge my support when I can’t even get a signed Maga hat without donating to our big daddy trump who is the greatest businessman on earth sent to us from God himself to defeat the libs and give every baby and gun and confederate flag with a SMILE. I am here only to eliminate anyone isn’t a Christian heterosexual Anglo saxon NRA card carrying freedom loving anti baby killin born and bred American who believes all lives matter but blue lives matter more who respects the flag and licks all boots, but believe women should be seen rather than heard and exist best when they allow their husbands to guide them and understand their sole purpose and identity is to birth and rear children and that is their sacred duty along with serving home cooked meals to her husband daily! An added bonus if you think we should interrogate Muslims and reconsider if allowing women the right to vote was the best choice for us and if we should debate that fact and make much needed changes. MAKE THIS APP GREAT AGAIN AND MAKE AMERICA WHITE...I MEAN, GREAT AGAIN! 

All of you are trash, and this is what you sound like: stop drinking the koolaid. It’s time to wake up, ya branch covidians- before it’s too late.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: My names Karen and today I downloaded this app to support trump but guess what, THE WHOLE APP WAS TRASHING HILARY AND I COULDN'T FIND A SINGLE IMAGE OF SENPAI TRUMP!  THEN HE SAYS TO ME THAT HES GONNA EAT MY KNEE CAPS, AND I WAS JUST SHOCKED, GIVE ME YOUR MANAGER!!!!!! SO I DELETED THE APP AND THEN MY KNEECAPS DISAPPEARED  AND THEN TRUMP CAME TO MY HOUSE AND ARRESTED ME FOR DELETING HIS APP!!
